com.google.code.rees.scope.conversation
Class SimpleConversationManager

java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.rees.scope.conversation.SimpleConversationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConversationManager, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultInjectionConversationManager
public class SimpleConversationManager
extends Object
implements ConversationManager

A simple yet effective implementation of ConversationManager that manages conversation life cycles, but does not inject ConversationFields. Ideal for using in cases such as when field injection will be handled by Spring.

Author:
rees.byars
See Also:
